title: Hello
content:
Hello World! I am the creator of this site. I created this site in order to teach people about cybersecurity and ethical hacking. 
 You can post questions/blogs in this blog section and connect with others.

title: I am an ethical hacker
content:
Hello! I am an ethical hacker and I like to protect the internet. I help various companies find security issues. I test many different types of hacks (like SQL injections, XSS attacks, and command execution attacks). 
 I work through HackerOne to find different assignments. I have worked for various companies that I unfortunately cannot mention due to my NDA.

title: I like to make computer viruses
content:
I like to make malware for fun and test them out on my virtual machines. I have them do various things like keylog, take screenshots, and infect files. 
 I sometimes code the viruses by myself using C, or I use tools like metasploit to help me create payloads and backdoors. I learned to make malware through tutorials on the internet. I also test these viruses against antivirus in order to test what the best antivirus software may be against viruses that evade antivirus.
